description.original: Drag to scroll - just like on a touch device.
description.translation: Drag to scroll - just like on a touch device.

dict..setDesc(\"The mouse button used to init: .setDesc("用于启动拖拽滚动的鼠标按键。")
dict..setDesc(\"An optional modifier key that: .setDesc("必须按住才能启用拖拽滚动的可选修饰键。")
dict..setDesc(\"Controls the glide effect aft: .setDesc("控制释放后的滑动效果。左侧立即停止，右侧长距离滑行。")
